column1: ''Bauglir'' is a song by the [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. It is the opening track of their sixth full-length album

column2: and look out upon the lands were evil and despair shall come upon those whom thou lovest. Thou hast dared to mock me
column3: and to question the power of [[Morgoth|Melkor]]
column4: Master of the fates of [[Arda]]. Therefore with my eyes thou shalt see
column5: and with my ears thou shalt hear and never shalt thou move from this place until all is fullfilled unto its bitter end."''
